subject: Travel
title: The Mariana Trench
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Mariana Trench usable.

hook.text: The Mariana Trench is nearly 36,000 feet deep. If you dropped Everest in, its peak wouldn't break the surface.

buildup.text: Only three crewed expeditions have reached the bottom. More people have walked on the Moon.

discovery.text: Life exists even there. Strange shrimp-like creatures and microbes thrive under crushing pressure.

twist.text: Researchers found a plastic bag at the bottom in 2019. Human trash reached Earth's deepest point.

climax.text: The trench is a national monument under US jurisdiction. Fishing and mining are banned.

punchline.text: We polluted the deepest place on Earth before we even explored it.

quiz.question: What was found at the bottom of the Mariana Trench in 2019?
